vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
πρᾱότης, ητος, ἡ,
mildness, gentleness, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; opposed to ἀγριότης, [Refs]; opposed to ὀργιλότης, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; opposed to ὀργή, [Refs 5th c.BC+]: later πραΰτης, [LXX+NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
gentleness, meekness, humility
also spelled πραότης, ητος, ἡ, meekness, mildness, forbearance, gentleness 1Pet. 3:15; gentleness, kindness, humility Jas. 1:21; 3:13; Gal. 5:23
